prompts: Create a mushroom-like Pokemon that glows softly in the dark.
Imagine a fairy-type Pokemon with a large, colorful cap and a gentle demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of nature and magic in its design.
Design a ghostly Pokemon with a whimsical appearance and playful personality.
Generate a cute Pokemon that resembles a mushroom and has a friendly aura.
Make a Pokemon that can thrive in forest environments and has healing abilities.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies both Grass and Fairy types with pastel colors.
